document.full_text: a detroit police station was briefly evacuated on thursday after a woman walked in unannounced and turned in grenades she had found in a yard, a spokeswoman said.
document.title: woman walks into detroit police station with grenades
lines_and_colors: a detroit police station was briefly evacuated on thursday after a woman walked in unannounced and turned in grenades she had found in a yard, a spokeswoman said.
